languages.text: "А был ли у него выбор, ван Калокс? Винтерскейлу плевать на станцию, а Лорд-капитан... отсутствовал{mf||а} по весьма уважительной причине".
"Did he have a choice, van Calox? Winterscale does not care one whit about the station, and the Lord Captain was... understandably absent."
languages.original_text: "А был ли у него выбор, ван Калокс? Винтерскейлу плевать на станцию, а Лорд-капитан... отсутствовал{mf||а} по весьма уважительной причине".

traits.locale_text: "Did he have a choice, van Calox? Winterscale does not care one whit about the station, and the Lord Captain was... understandably absent."
traits.speaker: AbelardCompanion

traits.locale_text: "Did he have a choice, van Calox? Winterscale does not care one whit about the station, and the Lord Captain was... understandably absent."
traits.speaker: AbelardCompanion

traits.locale_text: "Did he have a choice, van Calox? Winterscale does not care one whit about the station, and the Lord Captain was... understandably absent."
traits.speaker: AbelardCompanion

traits.locale_text: "Did he have a choice, van Calox? Winterscale does not care one whit about the station, and the Lord Captain was... understandably absent."
traits.speaker: AbelardCompanion

languages.text: “他有得选吗，冯·卡洛克斯？温特斯凯尔一点都不关心落脚港，而舰长大人……被当成了缺席处理。”
languages.original_text: "Did he have a choice, van Calox? Winterscale does not care one whit about the station, and the Lord Captain was... understandably absent."

traits.locale_text: “他有得选吗，冯·卡洛克斯？温特斯凯尔一点都不关心落脚港，而舰长大人……被当成了缺席处理。”
traits.speaker: AbelardCompanion

languages.text: « Mais avait-il seulement le choix, van Calox ? Winterscale se soucie de cette station comme d'une guigne, et {mf|le seigneur-capitaine|la seigneure-capitaine} était absente... pour de très bonnes raisons. »
languages.original_text: "Did he have a choice, van Calox? Winterscale does not care one whit about the station, and the Lord Captain was... understandably absent."

traits.locale_text: « Mais avait-il seulement le choix, van Calox ? Winterscale se soucie de cette station comme d'une guigne, et {mf|le seigneur-capitaine|la seigneure-capitaine} était absente... pour de très bonnes raisons. »
traits.speaker: AbelardCompanion

languages.text: «¿Acaso tenía elección, van Calox? A Winterscale le importa un comino la estación, y {mf|el|la} Lord Capitán estaba... comprensiblemente ausente».
languages.original_text: "Did he have a choice, van Calox? Winterscale does not care one whit about the station, and the Lord Captain was... understandably absent."

traits.locale_text: «¿Acaso tenía elección, van Calox? A Winterscale le importa un comino la estación, y {mf|el|la} Lord Capitán estaba... comprensiblemente ausente».
traits.speaker: AbelardCompanion

languages.text: 「ヴァン・キャロックス、彼が選定したのですか？ウィンタースケールはこのステーションを少しも気にかけていませんし、ロード・キャプテンは…当然、不在でしたからな」
languages.original_text: "Did he have a choice, van Calox? Winterscale does not care one whit about the station, and the Lord Captain was... understandably absent."

traits.locale_text: 「ヴァン・キャロックス、彼が選定したのですか？ウィンタースケールはこのステーションを少しも気にかけていませんし、ロード・キャプテンは…当然、不在でしたからな」
traits.speaker: AbelardCompanion

languages.text: "Hatte er denn eine Wahl, van Calox? Winterzunder schert sich einen Dreck um die Station, und der Lord Captain war ... verständlicherweise abwesend."
languages.original_text: "Did he have a choice, van Calox? Winterscale does not care one whit about the station, and the Lord Captain was... understandably absent."

traits.locale_text: "Hatte er denn eine Wahl, van Calox? Winterzunder schert sich einen Dreck um die Station, und der Lord Captain war ... verständlicherweise abwesend."
traits.speaker: AbelardCompanion

languages.original_text: "Did he have a choice, van Calox? Winterscale does not care one whit about the station, and the Lord Captain was... understandably absent."

languages.text: "Başka bir seçeneği var mıydı van Calox? İstasyon, Winterscale'in gram umurunda değil. Lord Kaptan da... Müsait değildi."
languages.original_text: "Did he have a choice, van Calox? Winterscale does not care one whit about the station, and the Lord Captain was... understandably absent."

traits.locale_text: "Başka bir seçeneği var mıydı van Calox? İstasyon, Winterscale'in gram umurunda değil ve Lord Kaptan da... Müsait değildi."
